title.rendered: ML tool and MLOps help social media giant improve live stream content moderation

<title>ML Tool and MLOps for Live Stream Content Moderation— ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="With live streaming going mainstream on social media channels, AI algorithms have been increasingly used as a tool to relive the misery of human moderators.
